text:
@BorisJohnson Under 18’s in separated, single, divorced families ALREADY move between 2 households or “bubble”. @michaelgove @CMO_England
So how do the new rules apply now to them? Can the parent have a 2nd ‘support bubble?’ No one has a clue.. #COVID19 @10DowningStreet @Keir_Starmer @UKLabour
